immediate_fixes.description: malloc/calloc result not checked for NULL
immediate_fixes.fix: Add NULL check: if (ptr == NULL) { handle error; }

short_term.description: Potential memory leak: variable 'bound_items' allocated but not freed
short_term.fix: Add free(bound_items); before function returns

short_term.description: Potential memory leak: variable 'data' allocated but not freed
short_term.fix: Add free(data); before function returns

short_term.description: Potential memory leak: variable 'sentences' allocated but not freed
short_term.fix: Add free(sentences); before function returns

short_term.description: Potential memory leak: variable 'res_size_t' allocated but not freed
short_term.fix: Add free(res_size_t); before function returns

short_term.description: Non-const static variable may cause thread safety issues
short_term.fix: Consider thread-local storage (__thread) or proper synchronization
